text: Franz von Stuck (February 23, 1863 – August 30, 1928) was a German painter, sculptor, printmaker, and architect. Among his famous paintings are The Sin from 1892. In 1906, Stuck got the Order of Merit of the Bavarian Crown. ==Works== Штюк.Грех.jpg|The Sin ==Related pages== *List of German painters ==Sources== Category:1863 births Category:1928 deaths Category:German painters
title: Franz Stuck
